title: Double Blind Cigar Smoking
itunes:title: Double Blind Cigar Smoking
description: This week on The Cigar Authority we're blind folding Mr Jonathan for a double-blind cigar smoking challenge. Can he guess the cigars without seeing them? We test him with the Diamond Crown Torpedo #8, Macanudo, J. Fuego Americana, and the Flor de las Antillas from My Father Cigars. All this and lots more only on THE Cigar Authority!
